00051 inline int nextPowerOf2( int number )
00052 {
00053         int rval = 1;
00054         while( rval < number )
00055         rval <<= 1;
00056         return rval;
00057 }

00064 template< typename T > T abs ( T value ) {  return static_cast< T >( fabs( value ) );  }

00072 inline float degToRad ( float deg )       {  return static_cast< float >( (PI * deg) / 180.0f );  }
00073 
00079 inline float radToDeg ( float rad )       {  return static_cast< float >( (180.0f * rad) / PI );  }

00096 inline int random( int min, int max )
00097 {
00098     return min + ( rand() % ( max - min+1 ) );
00099 }
00100 
00105 inline int random( int max )
00106 {
00107     return random( 0, max );
00108 }

00115 inline float random( float min, float max )
00116 {
00117     // Number 0..1
00118     float normalizedRandom = (float)rand() / RAND_MAX;
00119 
00120     // Return float in range min..max
00121     return  min  + ( normalizedRandom * ( max - min ) );
00122 }
00123 
00124 
00129 inline float random( float max )
00130 {
00131     return random( 0.0f, max );
00132 }

00141 inline bool equal( float f1, float f2 )
00142 {
00143     // Compare the abs difference between the float
00144     if( fabs( f1 - f2 ) < EPSILON )
00145         return true;
00146     else
00147         return false;
00148 }
00149 
00156 inline float dist( const Pos3D& pos1, const Pos3D& pos2 )
00157 {
00158   return pos1.distance( pos2 );
00159 }
00160 
00174 inline float map( float value, float low1, float hight1, float low2, float hight2 )
00175 {
00176     // Clamp value with limits of input range
00177     value = (value < low1) ?  low1 : value;
00178     value = (value > hight1) ?  hight1 : value;
00179 
00180     // Map to range 0..1
00181     float v = (value-low1) / fabs(hight1-low1); 
00182 
00183     // Map to output range
00184     return v * fabs(hight2-low2) + low2;
00185 }
